text: bhala tum mein koee bhee isako pasand karega ki usake lie khajooron aur angooron ka ek baag ho usake neeche naharen jaaree hon aur usake lie usamen tarah tarah ke meve hon aur (ab) usako budhaape ne gher liya hai aur usake (chhote chhote) naatavo kamazor bachche hain ki ekabaaragee us baag par aisa bagola aa pada jisamen aag (bharee) thee ki vah baag jal bhun kar rah gaya khuda apane ehakaam ko tum logon se saaf saaf bayaan karata hai taaki tum gaur karo
